records.name: Seabreeze View - Huraa Island

descriptions.general: Experience an abundance of unparalleled facilities and features at Seabreeze View. Maintain seamless communication using the complimentary Wi-Fi at home.Effortlessly arrange transportation to and from the airport using the home's airport transfer services.Discovering Maldive Islands becomes even more accessible, thanks to the taxi amenities provided at the home. During your stay at this fantastic home, the attentive front desk personnel can provide you with a range of amenities such as express check-in or check-out, luggage storage and safety deposit boxes.In search of city's top entertainment, seek assistance at the home's ticket service and tours for reservations. At the home, utilize the on-site laundromat, dry cleaning service and laundry service to maintain your beloved travel attire fresh, allowing you to bring fewer clothes.Craving relaxation? Make the most of your stay at the Seabreeze View with convenient amenities like room service and daily housekeeping at your disposal.For all your minor, last-minute requirements, the convenience stores can promptly cater to them, eliminating the need to venture out.For visitors wishing to smoke, designated smoking zones can be found.At Seabreeze View, every guestroom is provided with convenient amenities and fittings to ensure a comfortable stay. Enhance your experience at home with the knowledge that certain rooms are equipped with linen service and air conditioning for your convenience. In select rooms within the home, instant coffee and instant tea is available to cater to your requirements when desired. Essential restroom facilities are equally significant, and at the home, some visitor bathrooms offer toiletries to enhance your experience. Begin your day carefree at Seabreeze View, as complimentary breakfast is offered for your convenience. Begin your day feeling refreshed and invigorated as you enjoy a delightful cup of quality coffee available at the cafe situated within the home.At Seabreeze View, they are committed to catering to your unique requirements. They offer a variety of meal choices, encompassing halal alternatives for those with special dietary preferences.Enjoy an entertaining evening with your fellow travelers at the home's karaoke rooms.At Seabreeze View, visitors have the option to receive groceries directly in their accommodation, ensuring outstanding comfort and simplicity when it comes to meals.Do you excel in cooking? Prepare your personal dishes on-site at home's BBQ facilities and shared kitchen.During your stay at home, an array of engaging activities and amenities guarantees a delightful experience. During your stay, don't forget to allocate some moments to experience the readily available shoreline.Conclude your holiday perfectly with a visit to massage and spa on your final days.Discover the fitness amenities at home to maintain your health and strength during your getaway.
